product_name: Wagh Bakri Leaf Tea Poly Pack, 500g: Amazon.in: Amazon Pantry

reviews.review_body: Taste of Wagh Bakri is difficult to get in any other brand. We were using Wagh Bakri tea when we used to stay in Ahmedabad, but when we shifted to Bangalore we couldn't get it. We bought all different brands and tried most of the expensive ones as well. Needless to say, we missed it every single time.Now we found it on Amazon and it's the same old days back! Our guests keep complementing the taste of the tea. We love it!

I was introduced to Wagh Bakri brand of tea by a friend 4 years ago, and I must admit, I haven't tasted another since then. This tea brand has become a staple feature of my household's monthly grocery list.The flavor is excellent, unlike any other available in the market. I liked it the first time I tasted it and now I am addicted to it. My thrice daily tea fix is composed of a 1:1 blend of this flavor and its spiced version. I exhort everyone to try out the blend and see if your body can agree with it.I buy it only from Amazon because it is not easily available in physical stores, at least in New Delhi. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
I feel that it's the best tasting tea brand in this price range. I credit my tea addiction to this tea.

reviews.review_title: Glad to have been introduced to WB Tea
reviews.review_body: I had kind of gotten used to TATA Tea Gold but recently got recommended and told about Wagh Bakri, I thought I would give it a try. I did and I think I have found the change I was looking for.

reviews.review_title: Kindly do not add colors to tea . Let the tea remain natural as it is supposed to be
reviews.review_body: The product is good but the color they have added is bothering all our family members even food grades colors we do not like colored tea we do not like even if it tastes good
This tea gives good taste, blend. we are loving this, but sometimes rates are not competitive
Loved this tea, great color and flavor

I simply chanced upon this brand...and have been thanking my stars ever since. Love the flavor of this tea! As a true tea lover, I suggest that if you are looking for wholesome cuppa, this is one tea you must have in your pantry!
